blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: your blog used to be so much better. you used to actually be criticalof dan and now you are just like the other phannies....
question: your blog used to be so much better. you used to actually be criticalof dan and now you are just like the other phannies. disappointed
answer: Well, I do agree with you that my blog used to be better. It was much funnier, mostly because the phandom was a different place and people would send me all kinds of messages worthy of the snarky responses they got. I get messages like this fairly regularly though and I fail to understand why. I feel like the purpose of these types of messages is not so much to complain that I’m never critical of Dan because, if that was the case, you wouldn’t bother sending this ask in the first place, would you? There is clearly something specific you want me to criticize him for so why not just come out and say it and then I will be happy to give my opinion. I think I can be quite critical of Dan…when it’s deserved…but he’s not doing anything. Literally. The last thing he did was tweet to promote Phil’s latest video. That. Bastard.

summary: I truly believe dan's wears wigs.There is no reasons that his hair would have been this straight for so long it is inhuman and...
question: I truly believe dan's wears wigs.There is no reasons that his hair would have been this straight for so long it is inhuman and his curls looks professionally made sometimes. He probably has a lot of wigs for the same haircut and maybe during the tour he lost almost all of them in a suitcase. I saw someone saying this on another blog. This theory is interesting. Because that would mean thats why he doesnt show up anymore. He is bald. Not to be a creepy theorist but its almost a fact at this point
answer: Just for reference, this is how y’all sound when you try to prove Phan.

summary: I wonder why the only options this fandom seems to have are either leave or suffer for eternity while waiting for Dan to return....
question: I wonder why the only options this fandom seems to have are either leave or suffer for eternity while waiting for Dan to return. Don’t any of you have any other fandoms? Personally I’m invested in several things, so while Dan is absent I give my attention to other things I like and do my daily check up to see if there’s anything new going on here.
answer: a lot of people around here definitely act like they have zero other interests whatsoever.

reblog.comment: a lot of people around here definitely act like they have zero other interests whatsoever.

trail.content_raw: a lot of people around here definitely act like they have zero other interests whatsoever.
trail.content: a lot of people around here definitely act like they have zero other interests whatsoever.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Reincarnation Masterlist
body:
Again (ao3) - Crucified_To_A_Star

Summary: The anxiety of losing Dan has haunted Phil since they met, an irrational insecurity they both brushed off often. Neither of them know truly just how many times Phil has searched the Earth for Daniel, trying to fill the empty spot next to him that always feels cold unless he’s there. Phil will always find Daniel again.

All the Sinners Crawl (ao3) - TheOceanIsMyInkwell

Summary: The clock is ticking for Dan Howell, who has had a terminal illness for the past eight years. Everyone tells him it’s a miracle he’s made it to the age of 25. Maybe that miracle just might be Phil Lester, the mysterious nurse who happens to be a fallen angel, cast out of heaven and destined to wander the earth unaligned for eternity. The only problem? Dan’s name has already been written down for heaven–and Phil is bound for hell if he heals him.

And So It Shall Be - phansomedevil

Summary: “Do you believe in soulmates?” All lives are stories, and in every possible way, in every possible time, Dan and Phil find each other.

Déjà Vu (ao3) - xawesometrio

Summary: Daniel Howell was born with the curse of immortality and the only way to break that curse is to meet his soulmate twice and fall in love twice. He has already met Philip once and now he must wait for the chance to find him again.

In Any World (ao3) - CapriciousCrab

Summary: In any place, at any time, they will find each other.

I Wanna Sleep Next To You - lemonjuicehowell

Summary: yet another reincarnation au.

Once Joined (ao3) - hannahoftheinternet

Summary: In a world where reincarnation is regular and expected, a fluke of nature causes some people to remember their past lives. Keepers, as they’re called, live by a strict set of rules to keep their past lives from interfering with their present. Dan has always lived by these rules and never found fault with them, but when a figure from a past life appears and throws his feelings out of control, he is faced with a difficult choice: law or love.

Star-Crossed - But I Can’t Have You - kittyxuchiha11

Summary: Phil and Dan love each other more than anything else in the world. But of course, they can’t do anything about it. As twins you’re not supposed to love each other the way mum and dad do.

Tell Me Why (My Gods Look Like You) (ao3) - queerofcups

Summary: I will keep on waiting for your love.

The Lion And The Bear - staystreet

Summary: Each individual is assigned a spirit animal at age 15 which they will be reincarnated as after they die. Dan Howell’s spirit is a bear, and his best friend/boyfriend Phil’s is a lion. The pair have been planning to get married since they were children, but life doesn’t always go as planned. The betrothal of those with different animal spirits is so illegal that even the mention of such an act could get you arrested. Because of their relationship, they face not only homophobia, but also the threat of detainment or even death. However, the law is such for a reason, as Dan and Phil soon discover.

The Obstacle of Time (ao3) - VelvetCandy

Summary: In 1541, homosexuality was a crime punishable by death. For Daniel and his lover, it was a risk they were willing to take. However, when a witch by the name of Agnes whom is in love with Daniel catches them, she has the police arrest and hang them. She curses them, as well, to never meet again in their future reincarnations. But Daniel meets another witch in prison, one that blesses him to remember his past lives so he can find his lover again. The year is 2015, and Dan finds his love with the new name of Phil. While attempting to win him over, Agnes returns and means to bring Hell upon the men.

We Are Eternal (ao3) - GoodGollyMissYollie (Yollie183)

Summary: Fate tries - again and again - to give two soulmates their happy ending…

(When You Gonna Realise) It Was Just That The Time Was Wrong (ao3) - The_Blonde

Summary: Phil works in a coffee shop. Or at an animal sanctuary. Or at a university. Maybe he’s a Youtuber. Maybe he runs an editing firm. Sometimes he’s in the 1920s. In all of these places he has dreams. In all of these places he is in love with Dan. It’s just trying to work out which time is the right one.

Why Is This So Familiar? (ao3) - WrongEraDreamer

Summary: It didn’t start in 2009, or well… it did for the current Dan and Phil. However, for the previous ones it started long before, sometimes they got to be together and sometimes they didn’t.

Dan and Phil meeting and falling in love in different time eras. Some happy endings and some not so much.

reblog.comment:
Again (ao3) - Crucified_To_A_Star

Summary: The anxiety of losing Dan has haunted Phil since they met, an irrational insecurity they both brushed off often. Neither of them know truly just how many times Phil has searched the Earth for Daniel, trying to fill the empty spot next to him that always feels cold unless he’s there. Phil will always find Daniel again.

All the Sinners Crawl (ao3) - TheOceanIsMyInkwell

Summary: The clock is ticking for Dan Howell, who has had a terminal illness for the past eight years. Everyone tells him it’s a miracle he’s made it to the age of 25. Maybe that miracle just might be Phil Lester, the mysterious nurse who happens to be a fallen angel, cast out of heaven and destined to wander the earth unaligned for eternity. The only problem? Dan’s name has already been written down for heaven–and Phil is bound for hell if he heals him.

And So It Shall Be - phansomedevil

Summary: “Do you believe in soulmates?” All lives are stories, and in every possible way, in every possible time, Dan and Phil find each other.

Déjà Vu (ao3) - xawesometrio

Summary: Daniel Howell was born with the curse of immortality and the only way to break that curse is to meet his soulmate twice and fall in love twice. He has already met Philip once and now he must wait for the chance to find him again.

In Any World (ao3) - CapriciousCrab

Summary: In any place, at any time, they will find each other.

I Wanna Sleep Next To You - lemonjuicehowell

Summary: yet another reincarnation au.

Once Joined (ao3) - hannahoftheinternet

Summary: In a world where reincarnation is regular and expected, a fluke of nature causes some people to remember their past lives. Keepers, as they’re called, live by a strict set of rules to keep their past lives from interfering with their present. Dan has always lived by these rules and never found fault with them, but when a figure from a past life appears and throws his feelings out of control, he is faced with a difficult choice: law or love.

Star-Crossed - But I Can’t Have You - kittyxuchiha11

Summary: Phil and Dan love each other more than anything else in the world. But of course, they can’t do anything about it. As twins you’re not supposed to love each other the way mum and dad do.

Tell Me Why (My Gods Look Like You) (ao3) - queerofcups

Summary: I will keep on waiting for your love.

The Lion And The Bear - staystreet

The year is 2015, and Dan finds his love with the new name of Phil. While attempting to win him over, Agnes returns and means to bring Hell upon the men.
